description.value:
You dissolve your connection to your spirit companion for a short time so that it can infuse itself into the spirits of the area, expanding its influence on the world.

Daily âœ¦ Primal, Spirit, Zone

Minor Action • Area burst 3 within 10 squares

Special: Your spirit companion must be in the burst.

Effect: Your spirit companion disappears (if you have multiple spirit companions, they all disappear). The burst creates a zone of spirits that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any effect that refers to being adjacent to or within a certain number of squares of your spirit companion instead applies to targets within the zone. You can't use call spirit companion while the zone persists.

Sustain Minor: The zone persists.

Published in Primal Power, page(s) 75.
